price: و شما [چیزی را] نمی‌خواهید، مگر آنکه پروردگار جهانیان [اراده کند و] بخواهد.
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu rabbu al-ʿālamīna
